landing.title: Campus Ratings
landing.subtitle: Rate and Compare Your Professors
landing.description: Share your experience and help other students find the best teachers

hero.title: Rate Your Professors
hero.description: Help fellow students make informed decisions. Rate professors on teaching quality, availability, communication, knowledge, and fairness.

features.title: Why Use ProfRate?
features.subtitle: Make better academic decisions with honest reviews from real students

factors.title: 5-Factor Ratings
factors.description: Rate professors on teaching quality, availability, communication, knowledge, and fairness for comprehensive evaluations.

comparison.title: Side-by-Side Comparison
comparison.description: Compare multiple professors across all rating factors to find the best fit for your learning style.

anonymity.title: Complete Anonymity
anonymity.description: Your reviews are completely anonymous. Share honest feedback without any worry about repercussions.

roles.title: For Students, Teachers & Admins
roles.subtitle: Different roles with tailored access levels

cards.student: Rate professors, compare them, and read reviews from fellow students.
cards.teacher: View ratings and feedback to understand how students perceive your teaching.
cards.admin: Manage professors, moderate reviews, and oversee the entire platform.

final.title: Ready to Get Started?
final.subtitle: Join thousands of students making better academic decisions with honest professor reviews.

footer.tagline: Helping students make informed decisions since 2024

auth.successDescription: Your account has been created successfully.
auth.welcomeDescription: Login or create an account to get started

success.accountCreatedDescription: Welcome {{name}}! Your account has been created successfully.
success.overlayDescription: Your account has been successfully created. Redirecting you to login...

validation.passwordMustBeAtLeastFair: Password must be at least Fair strength

errors.loginFailedDescription: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials or create a new account.
errors.serverUnavailableDescription: The app can't reach the API from {{origin}}. Start the backend with 'npm run dev' (it should be on http://127.0.0.1:5000) and open the site from that same port.
errors.invalidPasswordDescription: The password you entered is incorrect. Please check your password and try again.
errors.userNotFoundDescription: This username cannot be found. Please login with a valid username.
errors.accountNotFound: The username "{{username}}" was not found in our system.
errors.wouldYouLikeToRegister: Would you like to create a new account?
errors.passwordsDontMatchDescription: Please make sure both passwords are the same.
errors.passwordTooWeakDescription: Password must be at least Fair strength (yellow).
errors.registrationFailedDescription: Could not create account. Please try again.

auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.forgotUsernameDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you your username.
auth.resetLinkSentDesc: Check your email for a link to reset your password. The link will expire in 24 hours.
auth.passwordResetDesc: Your password has been reset. You can now log in with your new password.
auth.usernameSentDesc: Check your email for your username.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

home.studentTagline: Rate your professors and help fellow students make better decisions.

roleMessage.student: Rate your professors and help fellow students make better decisions.
roleMessage.teacher: View how students rate their professors.

actions.rateDesc: Share your experience in under 60 seconds.
actions.compareDesc: Stack educators side by side before you decide.
actions.shortlistDesc: Save favorites and get notified when ratings change.
actions.feedbackDesc: See themes from recent student feedback instantly.

enhance.compareDesc: Quickly spot strengths before you decide.
enhance.ratePoint1: Five factors with tooltips for consistent scores.
enhance.ratePoint2: Highlight strengths and a quick takeaway.
enhance.ratePoint3: See what peers recently noticed most.
enhance.trustPoint1: Anonymous by design; no spam or doxxing.
enhance.trustPoint3: Verified profiles surface first for credibility.
enhance.trustDesc: Built to stay fair for students and faculty.

empty.title: No Professors Yet
empty.description: There are no professors in the system yet.

teacherDashboard.title: Teacher Dashboard
teacherDashboard.subtitle: View the feedback and ratings you've received from students
teacherDashboard.empty: No reviews yet. Once students submit reviews, you'll see your feedback here.
teacherDashboard.noProfile: No professor profile matches your account name ({{name}}). Ask an admin to link your teacher account to a professor profile.

chart.title: Average Ratings Comparison
chart.description: How your ratings compare across all categories

radar.description: Visual representation of your teaching metrics

listing.title: Professors

headline.title: Professors
headline.subtitle: Browse, rate, and compare professors with clearer filters and quicker actions.

actions.rateDesc: Keep ratings consistent with five guided factors.
actions.compareDesc: Queue up to 3 professors and see the spread instantly.
actions.compareHint: Picks stay saved while you browse.
